General.Name: AHB Holdings Bhd
General.Description: AHB Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, provides office interior solutions in Malaysia, Singapore, Saudi Arabi, and India. The company's product portfolio includes office interior products, office furniture, and specilaised computer furniture. It also engages in trading of office interior products, furniture, and specilaised computer furniture, as well as general merchants and transportation products; and offers property investment, constructions, and development of goods. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
